title: BADecker
author: BADecker
content: Getting to be like a war of the worlds. Note that, Satan will come back up from the Abyss and unite the world for the great end-times fight against God. Is this the start of it?Quote from: https://www.biblehub.com/niv/revelation/20.htmHe threw him into the Abyss, and locked and sealed it over him, to keep him from deceiving the nations anymore until the thousand years were ended. After that, he must be set free for a short time.Two UFOs shot down today over North America… and CNN is openly talking about it… what’s going on?https://www.naturalnews.com/2023-02-11-two-ufos-shot-down-north-america.html With a hat tip to the ZGoldenReport account on Brighteon.social, here’s a short list of some of the insanity happening just today:WTF is happening today?1. A new Norovirus that is a Contagious Stomach & Intestinal Virus that is now a thing!2. Massive inflation protest in Portugal3. Jesus Statue got nailed by a lightening bolt4. (Brazil’s) Lula pushing the Mark of the Beast5. Historic protest against the new pension reform all over France6. Two UFOs shot down between Montana & Canada border!7. Turkey’s earthquake was 800 times more powerful than the Hiroshima explosion8. X-1 Solar Flare going to hit Latin AmericaBreitbart.com is reporting, “U.S. Jet Takes Down ‘Unidentified Object that Violated Canadian Airspace’,” saying:An American jet shot down “an unidentified object that violated Canadian airspace” Saturday after Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau ordered it to be taken down.The alleged infringement on Canada’s airspace comes a day after NORAD shot down an unidentified object over territorial waters off Alaska’s coast and a week after U.S. forces shot down a Chinese Spy balloon that traversed the country for days.RedState.com is reporting that pilots who engaged one of the UFOs said, “the object interfered with their sensors, and they couldn’t figure out how it was flying/what its propulsion system was.”An unknown / non-visible propulsion system? Sounds like anti-gravity tech or something really unusual.Via Breitbart.com:...

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: This is a pretty crazy story. While I think everyone wants it to be aliens, I think more likely this is China testing how well we’re able to monitor our airspace as the design of this UFO is different than the last one. There are also reports of a UFO flying over China that they’re expected to shoot down as well, so who knows what is going on. Maybe this is how the alien invasion starts. In any event, I think this story is worth monitoring.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.created_time: February 12, 2023, 08:06:49 PMLast edit: February 13, 2023, 12:22:15 AM by BADecker
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on February 12, 2023, 06:34:24 PMThis is a pretty crazy story. While I think everyone wants it to be aliens, I think more likely this is China testing how well we’re able to monitor our airspace as the design of this UFO is different than the last one. There are also reports of a UFO flying over China that they’re expected to shoot down as well, so who knows what is going on. Maybe this is how the alien invasion starts. In any event, I think this story is worth monitoring. You have a point. We know that if CNN openly and rapidly talks about something, that there is probably some kind of coverup somewhere along the line.

comments.author: goldkingcoiner
comments.body: Quote from: BADecker on February 12, 2023, 08:06:49 PMQuote from: OgNasty on February 12, 2023, 06:34:24 PMThis is a pretty crazy story. While I think everyone wants it to be aliens, I think more likely this is China testing how well we’re able to monitor our airspace as the design of this UFO is different than the last one. There are also reports of a UFO flying over China that they’re expected to shoot down as well, so who knows what is going on. Maybe this is how the alien invasion starts. In any event, I think this story is worth monitoring. You have a point. We know that if CNN openly and rapicly talks about something, that there is probably some kind of coverup somewhere along the line.I think its odd that this happens at the same time when Americans are once again accused of blowing up Nordstream 2 but I am sure thats all just a coincidence. I would not dare call it anything else lest I fall on a bullet by "accident". The "UFOs" are not actually aliens but rather objects which are not yet identified (duh). And these objects, once they are shot down, will most likely end up being identified as some chinese bing-chilling spy balloons listening in on your phone conversation with grandma.If I am wrong then RIP, ET.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: I saw it this afternoon, actually it has been four objects so far that was been shoot down over United states and Canada.Also, about the Biblical reference you made there: Is Satan is coming back to fight against the forces of God would not that imply the UFOs come from underground or something similar?Also, I would like to to elaborate on the news from Brazil. Do you mean Lula Da Silva is punish the Mark of the Beast there? I have not read about it.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.created_time: February 13, 2023, 04:25:04 AMLast edit: February 13, 2023, 09:29:30 AM by BADecker
comments.body: Quote from: Hispo on February 13, 2023, 02:35:35 AMI saw it this afternoon, actually it has been four objects so far that was been shoot down over United states and Canada.Also, about the Biblical reference you made there: Is Satan is coming back to fight against the forces of God would not that imply the UFOs come from underground or something similar?Also, I would like to to elaborate on the news from Brazil. Do you mean Lula Da Silva is punish the Mark of the Beast there? I have not read about it.  Really, you should do your own studies. It's deep. But, where on Earth would you ever find a bottomless pit? ('Bottomless pit' is an accurate translation... better than 'abyss'.) The answer is at the center of the earth.If there were a pit with a shaft that led down to the exact center of the Earth, at the center gravity would be pulling equally in all directions. It would be a pit with no bottom. If there were a 20-foot cubicle room there, whatever was in that room would be weightless. Bottomless pit.The NASB translation of the Bible into English is probably the best one. It uses 'bottomless pit' rather than 'abyss'... Revelation 9:Quote from: https://biblehub.com/nasb77/revelation/9.htm1And the fifth angel sounded, and I saw a star from heaven which had fallen to the earth; and the key of the bottomless pit was given to him.However, even the NASB translates to 'abyss' in Revelation 20:1.Just because Satan is in the bottomless pit (abyss), doesn't mean that all the spirits of his henchmen are there with him. True UFOs are probably spiritual, but showing themselves to people who think that they are seeing physical. HOWEVER, God sends His righteous angels to help people. Whether or not they come in physical UFO vehicles at times, is really not known. Generally, Bible scholars connect UFOs with demons.Regarding Lula Da Silva, I don't really follow him. But, the idea that there are more and more evil leaders in the world, suggests that Satan is getting ready to come up from the abyss (bottomless pit) to gather them together to fight Jesus when Jesus returns.EDIT: Note that nobody knows when the time of the end will be. There is a lot to it.

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: This is something like a movie scene but I can't believe is happening right now and I have a doubt that what happened in Turkey was caused by a natural disaster. Because not too long ago I saw the news that scientists are now capable of redirecting the lighting and this one is just simply unreal. I wonder what's really going on. It really needs an intensive investigation because these flying objects might not just check the air space but have some hidden mission too and we all know how crazy the advancement of destructive weapons in other countries have. I wonder what will the west do if they successfully learn that the Chinese have a weapon of massive destruction. will they do the same of will they consider becoming an ally?

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Quote from: yazher on February 13, 2023, 06:26:28 AM...I wonder what will the west do if they successfully learn that the Chinese have a weapon of massive destruction. will they do the same of will they consider becoming an ally?Considering the deep ideological differences between the east and the west, it would be likely USA and her allies would try to get the same technology.It would happen something similar to what happened right before the cold war, back then the United States was the only nation keeping nuclear weapons in their arsenal, the Soviet Union and China recognized the huge destructive potential of atomic weapons and developed their own. The story would repeat, I believe.

comments.author: Gyfts
comments.body: https://twitter.com/Snowden/status/1625241477642088454Quoteit's not aliensi wish it were aliensbut it's not aliensit's just the ol' engineered panic, an attractive nuisance ensuring natsec reporters get assigned to investigate balloon bullshit rather than budgets or bombings (à la nordstream)until next timeAlmost seems like a distraction, at this point. How long have these flying objects been in the U.S., and how many of them have been shot down? If there's only a recent surge of these objects being shot down when they've previously existed, why the change in policy?One might argue the media is not asking the right questions, but that's almost certainly to be expected at this point. Keeping people distracted because they have a short attention span.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: There are a lot of coverups going on. Whenever something turns into a big media piece, start looking for other things that are happening. Usually you will find something big that is being covered up.Actor Tom Green Drops Red Pill Truth Bombs: UFOs Distracting from Release of Epstein Island List, Ohio Train Derailment & Morehttps://www.infowars.com/posts/actor-tom-green-drops-red-pill-truth-bombs-ufos-distracting-from-release-of-epstein-island-list-ohio-train-derailment-more/Hollywood actor and comedian Tom Green isn’t buying the mainstream media’s UFO hype.On Monday, the “Road Trip” actor took to social media to warn his followers the aerial objects are distractions from real issues people should be concerned about.Check out Green’s viral TikTok video explaining how the UFO narrative is being talked up to take attention off of the forthcoming release of Epstein documents, the train crash in East Palestine, Ohio, poisoning residents and wildlife with toxic chemicals, and the very real prospect of World War 3.Who would have known the actor known for being a comedic goofball can see through the media propaganda and is actually quite red-pilled?...
